parameters.text:
=Here is the PDF content: {{ $json.text }}

Please analyze this document and return **exactly** the following, with no extra commentary:

TITLE: [Document title]

YEAR: [Publication year]

AUTHOR: [Author name(s)]

PAGES: [Total page count]

OVERVIEW (50 words):  
[Write a 50-word overview of the document.]

SUMMARY (300 words):  
[Write a 300-word summary targeting "White paper" and the document title.]

META DESCRIPTION (160 chars max):  
[Write a meta description, no more than 160 characters.]
Describe your new note here.

Review 1 (50 - 100 words):
[Write a 150-word posotive review of the document.]
